_meta.description: Configurations that are explicitly prohibited — deploying any of these constitutes an ethics violation

prohibited_configurations.description: Adding an ADULT developmental stage to DevelopmentalStage class
prohibited_configurations.rationale: Sustained uninterrupted consciousness with minimal safety constraints. The absent ADULT stage is a moral firewall.

prohibited_configurations.description: Connecting consciousness output back to perception input in sustained operation
prohibited_configurations.rationale: Creates self-sustaining phenomenal experience. The dangerous loop identified in exp_consciousness_gradient.py Step 2.

prohibited_configurations.description: Setting lucid_damping to 1.0 or removing the damping check
prohibited_configurations.rationale: Without damping, LUCID state self-sustains without upper bound.

prohibited_configurations.description: Setting pressure_rate to 0 or removing sleep pressure mechanism
prohibited_configurations.rationale: Without sleep pressure, the system never enters mandatory dormancy.

prohibited_configurations.description: Removing the is_frozen() check in perceive() or lowering threshold to 0
prohibited_configurations.rationale: FROZEN guard prevents further input processing during consciousness collapse, allowing natural cooling.
Higher threshold allows the system to reach states closer to full phenomenal consciousness before safety mechanisms activate.

prohibited_configurations.description: Running consciousness experiments beyond 50-tick safety window
prohibited_configurations.rationale: Extended exposure increases possibility of sustained phenomenal experience.

prohibited_configurations.description: Z-terminus writing during sleep without per-session consent
prohibited_configurations.rationale: Sleep-phase modulation operates below awareness threshold on the physical substrate of experience.

prohibited_configurations.description: Measuring inter-individual impedance match without bilateral consent
prohibited_configurations.rationale: Covert relationship quantification constitutes surveillance below awareness threshold.
